title: How can the 9 elements of critical thinking be applied in ethical reasoning? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know about nine elements of critical thinking; it might be just my personal limitations. I am familiar with four however: conceptualizing, analyzing, synthesizing, and evaluating. Ethics. like any subject other than religion, is liable to rational analysis from which conclusions can be reached or at least conceptualized. I find the four listed above sufficient for my limited comprehension.
